item.title: Setup vscode development for dapr in WSL
item.description: Dapr development is quite difficult to setup correctly. You can get the idea from (this issue) as the issue is still open now since it was created. I followed the instruction to install dapr vs code extension in dapr. My environment is WSL based. I tried several times to try to debug the dapr applications and failed. I noticed in the following screenshot that there was a warning icon before kubernetes.
